name: Battleship (itch) (Leah)
description:
This is a recreation of the board game Battleship.  

The goal of Battleship is to find and sink all of your opponents ships before they sink all of yours. You may choose where your ships are placed or randomize the locations of all of them. The AI opponent has three different levels of difficulty to choose from:

-Easy: picks randomly for the entire game

-Medium: picks randomly until a ship is hit, will then target ship until it is destroyed

-Hard: picks randomly from half the grid (every other space) until a ship is found, then targets ship until destroyed

This was a solo project created for my Artificial Intelligence final.
